meanings.sent1: The vines in the jungle were the snarliest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Her hair was the snarliest after a windy day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the snarliest necklace was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The snarliest traffic jam made everyone late for work.
meanings.sent5: The snarliest branches of the tree intertwined like a complex dance.

meanings.definition: Snarliest (adverb): in a tangled or twisted manner
meanings.sent1: The rope was wound snarliest around the pole.
meanings.sent2: She twisted her hair snarliest while lost in thought.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail curled snarliest when it was excited.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed snarliest through the narrow canyon.
meanings.sent5: The vines grew snarliest around the old stone wall.

meanings.definition: Snarliest (noun): the most tangled or twisted part
meanings.sent1: The snarliest of the yarn was impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent2: He carefully combed through the snarliest of the fishing lines.
meanings.sent3: The snarliest of the garden hose was always a challenge to straighten out.
meanings.sent4: She carefully avoided the snarliest of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The snarliest of the maze led to the hidden treasure.
